pageContext.claim: “I know you have a record crowd; that’s nice.  It’s always nice to set records.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump's claim that the Farm Bureau set a record for attendance for its convention is wrong. "Conversations with staff suggest this year’s convention was one of the largest in recent years, but perhaps half of what it was several decades ago, when the farming population was larger," said spokesman Will Rodger. "We hosted approximately 6,000 people this year, which is roughly 20 percent higher than two years ago."
